title: Generate Patient List for Outreach
description: A care manager needs a list of all high-risk asthma patients who have had an ED visit in the last 6 months.

tasks.description: Open the patient list builder tool in the analytics platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager accesses the reporting tool.

tasks.description: Build a query with the following criteria: (Diagnosis = Asthma) AND (Risk Score = High) AND (ED Visit within last 180 days).
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager correctly defines the criteria for the patient list.

tasks.description: Run the query and generate the list of patients.
tasks.expected_outcome: A targeted list of patients is created, allowing the care manager to focus their outreach efforts on the most vulnerable patients.
